data.name: PumPum
data.detailed_description:
PumPum is a casual game for adults with simple, relaxing gameplay, and features many sexy girls in different poses. Each girl shows off lovely graphics and animations!

What you will find in the game:
  • Beautiful animations of girls.
  • Can be played with one hand!
  • 4K resolution.
  • Best animated wallpapers and avatars on Steam!
  • Awesome sound and visual effects.
  • Gallery with hot pictures of girls.
  • Lots of levels to play.


Outstanding artwork, hot sexy girls, and easy to play!
What else could you possibly need for a great gaming experience?
If you love hot animated girls, then PumPum is meant for you!

The rules of the game are very simple:
  • Match and remove all tile pairs from a board to open next animation.
  • Find and connect two identical images with THREE or LESS straight lines.


Though I've been making games for many years, PumPum is my first NSFW project. I really need your support and feedback to make it even better. I believe the game will be one of the best minigames for adults on Steam!

data.short_description: PumPum is an addictive hentai puzzle game with many hot girls that you must collect! Each girl shows off lovely graphics and animations!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Japanese*, Korean*, Portuguese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Vietnamese*, Arabic*, Hungarian*, Spanish - Spain*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support

data.legal_notice:
Original artworks by 양만식 "Yam Spectrum".
This game is a fan-based parody. Any reference to original characters is purely coincidental.
Special thanks to Ágost "The Dreadist" Veres for translation to Hungarian!
